summary: This module contains a suite of unit tests that verify the behavior of the random cropping transform based on label classes. The tests cover correct handling of class indices, deterministic cropping with a fixed seed, proper interaction with lazy (pending) operations, and compatibility with different array types and MetaTensor metadata, ensuring that the output shapes and types are as expected.
